title: How long it take to respond to a ticket.
body: Well, I wrote down a ticket with a suspension that I got, it was an misunderstanding with it, how long it take to respond ? Thank you{{champion:44}}

replies.body: I'm not sure of the average EU response time, but NA's is generally around about 12-14 hours. I did see your ticket in their queue, but make sure not to send replies until they say something, as that can actually bump your ticket back in the line from 'spam'.
